entry.title: https://github.com/VUnit/vunit
entry.content: VUnit is a unit testing framework for VHDL/SystemVerilog

entry.title: https://github.com/chili-chips-ba/wireguard-fpga
entry.content: Full-throttle, wire-speed hardware implementation of Wireguard VPN, using low-cost Artix7 FPGA with opensource toolchain. If you seek security and privacy, nothing is private in our codebase. Our door is wide open for backdoor scrutiny, be it related to RTL, embedded, build, bitstream or any other aspect of design and delivery package. Bujrum!

entry.title: https://github.com/hdl-modules/hdl-modules
entry.content: A collection of reusable, high-quality, peer-reviewed VHDL building blocks.
